metadata.name: Concrete Oasis
metadata.description:
While waiting to meet with a friend, I found a true 'Concrete Oasis' in the middle of downtown San Francisco. 

This is my personal favorite 35mm shot and also my very first NFT on Foundation! 

Your purchase will directly fund a new medium format 120mm camera to continue with higher quality black and white work. 



"Fund the artist, increase the value."

-Pablo Picasso (Probably)
